mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectGodAditDetail Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ GOD_NO , GOD_ADIT_DETAIL_CD , GOD_ADIT_DETAIL_IEM_CD , LWPRT_VAL_CONT , LWPRT_VAL_UNIT_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM GOD_ADIT_DETAIL WHERE 1 = 1 AND GOD_NO = #{godNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND GOD_ADIT_DETAIL_CD = #{godAditDetailCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND GOD_ADIT_DETAIL_IEM_CD = #{godAditDetailIemCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
